title: Calories in Mini Cucumbers
meta_description: Learn calories in mini cucumbers per 100g, including carbs, fiber, protein, and full nutrition facts for easy tracking.
assumptions: Fresh, raw mini cucumbers with skin; similar to English or Persian varieties; no added seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, freshness, growing conditions, and size; check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: 100g of mini cucumbers provides about 16 kcal and is mostly water with some fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Sliced with 1 tsp olive oil per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in one mini cucumber?
faqs.a: About 8-12 kcal for a typical 50-75g mini cucumber.
Yes, only 3.6g carbs per 100g, with 1g fiber.

faqs.q: What's the protein in mini cucumbers?
faqs.a: Minimal at 0.7g per 100g; they're not a protein source.
Very low, just 0.1g total fat per 100g.

faqs.q: How does picking affect calories in mini cucumbers?
faqs.a: Pickling adds about 5 kcal per 100g from vinegar and spices.
